prompt:
Style: Delicate watercolor with soft washes and fine linework.
Muted palette: dusty lavenders, soft violet, warm grays, pale coral accents.
Vignette compositions fading gently to white.
Diffused lighting, intimate and quiet.

Generate a full body character portrait. The character's face and appearance must match the reference headshot exactly.

Physical appearance: Miniature tree approximately 25 cm tall, ancient bonsai form with gnarled trunk and twisted branches. Bark is deeply textured, dark brown with gray patches. Tiny dense leaves in small clusters. The trunk shows centuries of growth in constrained conditions—elegant twists and turns, character lines, survivor's adaptations. Root system is remarkably deep for the size, visible where they emerge from the housing. Despite the small size, the tree radiates age and patience. Sits in a special housing on Florence's wheeled platform.

Outfit and pose: A complete miniature ancient tree, approximately 25 cm tall from roots to canopy, in natural bonsai form with deeply gnarled trunk and twisted branches. Dark brown bark with gray patches, deeply textured showing centuries of constrained growth. Tiny dense leaves in small clusters throughout the small canopy. Elegant twists and character lines visible throughout. Remarkable root system visible emerging from the simple housing mount on a three-wheeled salvaged metal platform. The complete organism from roots to leaf tips, showing full scale. Despite miniature size, radiates ancient patience and wisdom. Purple forest floor visible around the wheeled platform. Soft purple twilight background with lavender atmosphere.

Framing: Full body, standing in a relaxed natural pose, head turned slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Elder Twist" as text at the bottom of the image.

references.prompt:
Style: Delicate watercolor with soft washes and fine linework.
Muted palette: dusty lavenders, soft violet, warm grays, pale coral accents.
Vignette compositions fading gently to white.
Diffused lighting, intimate and quiet.

Generate a character portrait headshot (shoulders up) against a plain neutral background.

Physical appearance: Miniature tree approximately 25 cm tall, ancient bonsai form with gnarled trunk and twisted branches. Bark is deeply textured, dark brown with gray patches. Tiny dense leaves in small clusters. The trunk shows centuries of growth in constrained conditions—elegant twists and turns, character lines, survivor's adaptations. Root system is remarkably deep for the size, visible where they emerge from the housing. Despite the small size, the tree radiates age and patience. Sits in a special housing on Florence's wheeled platform.

Clothing and expression: Close-up of the miniature tree's gnarled trunk and upper branches. Deeply textured bark with elegant twists showing centuries of growth, dark brown with gray patches. Character lines and survivor's adaptations visible in the wood. Tiny dense leaves in small clusters on twisted branches. Despite miniature scale (approximately 25 cm tall), radiates profound age and patience. The tree sits in a simple housing on Florence's wheeled platform - not a decorative bonsai pot, just a functional mount. Soft purple twilight background.

Framing: Head and shoulders, centered, looking slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Elder Twist" as text at the bottom of the image.
